comments: Beyond helpful and easy to understand. The class setup was also simple. He honestly was one of the best Professors I\'ve had.
Mr. Rogers was a great teacher. He made himself available to his students. Helped us understand the materiel covered, even if parts were dull and boring, he made it interesting.

I strongly recommend that you take his class, he is such a nice man and he gives great reviews before tests which help a lot! He is very easy going and fair and is super easy to get a long with. He really takes interest in his students and wants them all to learn. With his teaching you will become interested in finance if you aren\'t already!

This teacher was great. He helped you with anything you needed and went over the test before hand. He does case studies relating to the topic you are learning. this is help review and makes the topic easier to understand. He only gives 5 grades other than the test. He made learning fun. I definately take this teacher again if I could.
He was good overall, giving realistic scenerio\'s and helpful tips about what to do with your money today.
Great teacher. Very friendly and easy to understand. Class is not hard. Tests based on notes, which he is meticulous about. Gives great reviews before tests!
Taught me everything I needed to know about real world finance. Go to class and you will do fine on the tests.
